bboxes.reason: The function_button is a soft pad, and the label and symbol of the 'Function' area are the execution area. Bounding box 10 best captures this element.

The control element power_temperature_up_button corresponds to the '+' button on the appliance's panel. Bounding box 9 accurately captures the pressing area of this button, making it the most appropriate choice.
The element 'digital_display' is a visible digital screen displaying '8:8:8:8'. Bounding box 7 fits this element most accurately by enclosing only the display without including unrelated areas.
Bounding box 8 covers the entirety of the pressing area for the '-' button, which is the power_temperature_down_button. This aligns with the Button Selection Criteria.
The bounding box with index 11 best fits the power button as it captures the pressing area of the On/Off button, which is clearly the interactive control element for this function.
